section.name: Nightly Builds
section.p: We don't provide binary nightly builds at the moment.

section.name: Continuous Builds
section.p: Ant and Ivy are using Continous Integrations systems to improve the development process. Note that these are no official builds and they are not endorsed or even supported by the Ant team. But if you have problems with testing the latest (successful) build, you are welcome to post that on the developer mailinglist. You can directly access the builds of Ant and Ivy on these CI installations:
The Apache Software Foundation hosts an installation of the Jenkins CI-system which Ant + Ivy use.

job.title: Ant JDK-Matrix 1.9-branch
job.description: Checks Ant 1.9-branch against several JDKs (1.5, 1.6, 1.7, 1.8) on several OS (Ubuntu, Windows)

job.title: Ant JDK-Matrix master-branch
job.description: Checks Ant master-branch against several JDKs (1.8, OpenJDK 1.8) on several OS (Ubuntu Windows)

job.title: Checks Ant POMs by building Ant from the POMs.
job.description: Checks the POMs by building Ant by Maven

job.title: Ant Nightly
job.command: ant allclean distribution | ant -f check.xml dumphtml findbugs rat
job.description: Metric checks of Ant Trunk (Findbugs, RAT, Checkstyle)

job.title: Props
job.description: Library of supplementary handlers for Ant properties resolution.

job.title: Ivy Core Trunk Checks
job.command: ant findbugs checkstyle-internal | ant -file build-release.xml -Drat.failOnError=false rat
job.description: Metric checks of Ivy Trunk (Findbugs, RAT, Checkstyle)

job.title: IvyDE Trunk
job.command: ant clean hudson-prepare | ant dist checkstyle rat

job.title: Eclipse Updatesite
job.description: Update your Eclipse installation with the latest Ivy/IvyDE

section.p: JetBrains is offering Ant the service of a Continuous Build on their TeamCity system.
